screen.name: dashboard_screen
screen.description: Main dashboard displaying current weather information and quick access to other features.

components.description: Displays the current wind speed and direction.
Displays current precipitation type and intensity.
Displays the timestamp of the last weather data update.
Displays a summary of the daily weather forecast for the next several days.
Button to navigate to the location management screen to view and manage saved locations.

props.text: Location access denied. Location-based features are unavailable.

components.description: Prominent message informing the user about denied location permission and its impact on features.

props.title: Location Detection Failed
props.message: Unable to detect your current location. Please try again or manage your locations.

components.description: Dialog to inform user of location detection failure with options to retry or manage locations.
Button to navigate to the settings screen.
Button to navigate to the Radar Map screen.
Button to navigate to the Location Management Screen to select a location for historical data.
Summary card displaying active non-severe weather alerts on the dashboard.
Displays the user's current detected or selected location.

component_instances.description: Displays the current wind speed and direction.
Displays current precipitation type and intensity.
Displays the timestamp of the last weather data update.
Displays a summary of the daily weather forecast for the next several days.
Button to navigate to the location management screen to view and manage saved locations.

props.text: Location access denied. Location-based features are unavailable.

component_instances.description: Prominent message informing the user about denied location permission and its impact on features.

props.title: Location Detection Failed
props.message: Unable to detect your current location. Please try again or manage your locations.

component_instances.description: Dialog to inform user of location detection failure with options to retry or manage locations.
Button to navigate to the settings screen.
Button to navigate to the Radar Map screen.

Summary card displaying active non-severe weather alerts on the dashboard.

component_types.name: WeatherDisplayCard
component_types.description: A card component to display various weather-related information.

supported_props.description: Name of the location for the weather display.
supported_props.name: locationName

supported_props.description: Current temperature.
supported_props.name: temperature

supported_props.description: Current weather condition (e.g., Sunny, Cloudy).
supported_props.name: condition

supported_props.description: Icon representing the current weather condition.
supported_props.name: icon

supported_props.description: Precipitation information.
supported_props.name: precipitation

supported_props.description: Humidity percentage.
supported_props.name: humidity

supported_props.description: Wind speed and direction.
supported_props.name: windSpeed

supported_props.description: Callback function when the card is clicked.
supported_props.name: onClick

component_types.name: TextDisplay
component_types.description: A component to display static or dynamic text.

supported_props.description: The text content to display.
supported_props.name: text

component_types.name: ConfirmationDialog
component_types.description: A dialog box to confirm user actions.

supported_props.description: Controls the visibility of the dialog.
supported_props.name: isOpen

supported_props.description: Callback function when the dialog is closed.
supported_props.name: onClose

supported_props.description: Callback function when the confirm button is clicked.
supported_props.name: onConfirm

supported_props.description: Title of the confirmation dialog.
supported_props.name: title

supported_props.description: Message content of the confirmation dialog.
supported_props.name: message

component_types.name: DailyForecastList
component_types.description: A list component to display daily weather forecast entries.

supported_props.description: Array of daily forecast data, each item containing date, high/low temperature, and weather conditions.
supported_props.name: forecastItems

supported_props.description: Text displayed on the button.
supported_props.name: label

supported_props.description: Callback function when the button is clicked.
supported_props.name: onClick

supported_props.description: Visual style of the button (e.g., solid, outline, ghost).
supported_props.name: variant

component_types.name: IconButton
component_types.description: An icon button used to initiate a search.

supported_props.name: icon
supported_props.description: Name of the icon to display.

supported_props.name: onClick
supported_props.description: Callback function when the button is clicked.

supported_props.name: ariaLabel
supported_props.description: Accessibility label for the button.
